title: In Queue bug

embed.description: So just now I try to play some ARAM games and soon as I click find match, the queue goes on and after a minute it shows I have declined the game. There is literally no Play button pops up at all.

body: this issue still exists regardless after I tried everything. Please do HELP  in asap.  Super annoying, I can't play any games in any type right now. And it's getting close to season end. Plz, do something about it.

replies.body:
I noticed you never mentioned having tried the steps I gave you in your previous post. Hit up the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and linked and try the steps I explained in your last post, which you linked here. Specifically, do the two about Port Forwarding and how to configure your DNS and let me know how that helps by *testing it in a custom/practice game*. 

You mentioned it being the end of the season, and I'd hate for you to end up getting leaverbusters because you keep trying to play with these connection issues.
Like I said, nothing worked out. I tried everything with all you said.
